casebody.data:
STATE v. STRAUSSER. No. COA04-982. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed April 5, 2005. Certification Date April 25, 2005. Appeal from Surry, (01CRS52752, 01CRS52753, 01CRS52754, 01CRS52755, 02CRS715, 02CRS2436, 02CRS50350, 02CRS50680, 02CRS51003, 02CRS51004, 02CRS51005).

Case reported without published opinion. Vacated in part and remanded in part for resentencing.
